lead_paragraph: Fidelity will end the partnership it has had with American Express for its cards, which are considered to have one of the more generous rewards program.

headline.print_headline: Fidelity Switches to Visa for Credit Card Branding
headline.main: Fidelity Switches to Visa for Credit Card Branding

snippet: Fidelity will end the partnership it has had with American Express for its cards, which are considered to have one of the more generous rewards program.
abstract: Fidelity will end 12-year partnership with American Express and begin issuing Visa-branded cards through US Bank; shift will not affect its 2 percent cash back offer.
